messages.subject: Re: Grandma time
messages.msgSnippet: If you have to spend time at home with the grandparents, you could get out that box of papers and let the kids go through it with them.  The kids would
messages.messageBody:
If you have to spend time at home with the grandparents, you could get out that box of papers and let the kids go through it with them. The kids would probably love to show them what they drew, wrote, did, etc. I save a box like this every year, too. We like to go through the boxes occasionally to bring back memories.




________________________________________________________________
Sent via the WebMail system at 1st.net
